statements: SELECT * FROM special_events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM special_events
SELECT event_description FROM special_events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM special_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%workshop%'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM special_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM special_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM special_events WHERE event_id = 10 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_description FROM special_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM special_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%celebration%';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM special_events WHERE event_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM events
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location='New York'
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT promo_name, promo_description FROM promotions WHERE promo_start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND promo_end_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(promo_id) AS total_promotions FROM promotions
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT promo_name, promo_description FROM promotions WHERE promo_start_date < '2022-10-01' AND promo_end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events JOIN promotions ON events.event_id = promotions.promo_id
SELECT DISTINCT event_location FROM events
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_desc FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM event_participants ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, promotion_name FROM events JOIN promotions ON events.event_id = promotions.promotion_id;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM events JOIN event_participants ON events.event_id = event_participants.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT event_name, event_date, promotion_name, promotion_desc FROM events JOIN promotions ON events.event_id = promotions.promotion_id WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM special_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM special_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_type, start_date FROM promotions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_guests JOIN special_events ON event_guests.event_id = special_events.event_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM promotion_customers WHERE promotion_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM special_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM special_events WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT promotion_type, promotion_description FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2023-06-01' AND end_date > '2023-06-01';

SELECT event_name, event_description, event_date, guest_name, guest_email FROM special_events JOIN event_guests ON special_events.event_id = event_guests.event_id WHERE special_events.event_date > '2023-06-01';

SELECT promotion_type, promotion_description, customer_name, customer_email FROM promotions JOIN promotion_customers ON promotions.promotion_id = promotion_customers.promotion_id WHERE promotions.promotion_type = 'Discount';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events;
SELECT * FROM Promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM Promotions WHERE discount > 0.1 ORDER BY discount ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM Events ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Promotions WHERE discount > 0.2 AND start_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT Events.event_name, Customers.customer_name FROM Events JOIN Reservations ON Events.event_id = Reservations.event_id JOIN Customers ON Customers.customer_id = Reservations.customer_id;
SELECT event_name, discount FROM Events JOIN Promotions ON Events.event_id = Promotions.promotion_id WHERE discount > 0.1 ORDER BY discount DESC;
